mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project.product (product_code, product_name, standard, unit, weight, price) VALUE (#{productCode}, #{productName}, #{standard}, #{unit}, #{weight}, #{price});
mapper.update: UPDATE project.product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_code = #{productCode}, standard = #{standard}, unit = #{unit}, weight = #{weight}, price = #{price} WHERE product_no = #{productNo} AND hide = 0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project.product WHERE product_no = #{productNo} AND hide = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project.product WHERE product_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productCode}, '%') AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%') AND hide = 0
